definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: It attracted many thousands of visitors from all levels of society.
sentences.chinese: 水晶宮曾吸收了社會各階級的瞻仰者駐足欣賞。

sentences.english: "Hopefully, I can be involved against Palace, " he told ManUtd. com.
sentences.chinese: “希望我能參加對水晶宮的比賽，”他告訴曼聯網站。

sentences.english: The football player has transferred to Crystal Palace.
sentences.chinese: 這名足球運動員已轉會到水晶宮隊。

sentences.english: Later, the Crystal Palace was moved to South London.
sentences.chinese: 後來水晶宮搬到了倫敦南郊。

sentences.english: Crystal Palace thrashed Nottingham Forest three-nil.
sentences.chinese: 水晶宮隊以三比零完勝諾丁漢森林隊。

sentences.english: Crystal Palace are his team, and he also adores watching David Beckham.
sentences.chinese: 他的主隊是水晶宮隊，他也喜歡看貝殼踢球。

sentences.english: Mikael Forssell scored his first goal after a year's loan to Crystal Palace.
sentences.chinese: 弗賽爾租借水晶宮一年期滿歸來，首次爲切爾西破門。

sentences.english: A huge cavern inside the Reed Cave, known as Crystal Palace, boasts a capacity of 1,000 people.
sentences.chinese: 蘆笛巖內有一個大洞，被稱爲水晶宮，能容納一千人。

sentences.english: The mysteries of the Ice Palace will likely remain unsolved, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，水晶宮的奧祕仍待解決。

sentences.english: On arriving in England, they were taken to the Crystal Palace by train.
sentences.chinese: 一到英國，火車就把他們送到了水晶宮。

sentences.english: The Crystal Palace was different from all other building in the world.
sentences.chinese: 這座水晶宮不同於世界上所有的其他建築。

definition: FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
Salt Lake City, capital of Utah
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan
to face an attack/to repulse the enemy
